places.name: Ring Road
places.perex: The Sofia ring road is an important thoroughfare surrounding Sofia, the capital of Bulgaria.

places.name: Dushantsi Reservoir
places.perex: The Dushantsi reservoir is settled in the Balkan Mountains, Bulgaria.

places.name: Baikushev's Pine
places.perex: Baikushev's pine is a coniferous tree from the species Bosnian pine situated in Pirin, southwestern Bulgaria.

places.name: Nikopolis ad Istrum
places.perex: Nicopolis ad Istrum or Nicopolis ad Iatrum was a Roman and Early Byzantine town founded by Emperor Trajan around 101–106, at the junction…

places.name: Popovo Lake
places.perex: The Popovo Lake is the largest of the eleven Popovi Lakes. The lake and its vicinity is among the most popular places for summer tourism in…

places.name: Dulovo
places.perex: Dulovo è un comune bulgaro situato nella Regione di Silistra di 38.569 abitanti. La sede comunale è nella località omonima

places.name: Peshtera Monastery
places.perex: The Peshtera Monastery of Saint Nicholas of Myra, also known as the Mraka Monastery or Oryahov Monastery is a medieval Eastern Orthodox…

places.name: Belenski most
places.perex: The Belenski most or Byala Bridge is an arch bridge over the Yantra River in northern Bulgaria, 1 km from the town of Byala in Ruse…

places.name: Monti Balcani
places.perex: I Monti Balcani sono un sistema montuoso situato nella parte centrale della Penisola balcanica tra Bulgaria e Serbia.

places.name: Open-Air Theatre
places.perex: It's summer and nights are warm. Strolling through the city gets a bit weary.

places.name: Pirotska Street
places.perex: Friendly to pedestrians, you can take a nice walk in this street. There are many stores around, where you can do window-shopping.

places.name: Plamk Racing EOOD Avtoserviz Stara Zagora
Church St. St. Cyril and Methodius
Church of the Transfiguration of Our Lord
places.perex: A small church, which is hidden in Lozenets quarter of Sofia. You can go and sit inside and marvel at beautifully painted walls.

places.name: Caligula Dance Club
places.perex: The only gay bar in the city attracts a lot of attention, not only because of its orientation but also because of the cool music they play.

places.name: Saint Sofia Golf Club and Spa
places.perex: A golf course suitable for both beginners and advanced players. You can buy equipment in the club shop.

places.name: Horizont
places.perex: Hip dance club hosting the most popular DJs of the city. House music, perfect vibe and breathtaking view.

places.name: City Gallery of Fine Art
places.perex: White canvas with a black dot! Yeah, some might wonder what is the future of modern art, others love it.

places.name: Panorama di Pleven
places.perex: Il Panorama di Pleven o Panorama dell'epopea di Pleven del 1877, è un panorama situato nella città di Pleven, in Bulgaria, che racconta le…

places.name: Yalta Club
places.perex: Yalta Club is a nightclub in Sofia, Bulgaria. It was ranked among the Top 100 Clubs by DJ Mag in its annual rankings in 2009 and 2010.

places.name: Pirin Golf & Country Club
places.perex: This 18-hole par 72 golf course is surrounded by the magnificent Pirin Mountains. Enjoy the rough terrain!

places.name: Air Sofia Club
places.perex: Located in the Sofia region, this golf club offers great conditions for playing golf and relaxation. Green grass will be all around you!

places.name: Plovdiv University "Paisiy Hilendarski"
places.perex: The Plovdiv University "Paisii Hilendarski", also known as The Paisii Hilendarski University of Plovdiv, is a university located in Plovdiv…

places.name: Markovo Tepe Mall
places.perex: Fully fledged shopping mall with more than 100 shops! There's also a supermarket, restaurants and an entertainment center.

places.name: Sveta Nedelya Church
places.perex: The iconostasis (wall of icons) is pretty remarkable! All are wooden carved and one wonders how come the artists were so skillful.

places.name: Sveta Marina Church
places.perex: The wooden bell tower is overlooking all the surrounding roofs. Church was rebuilt several times.

places.name: Plovdiv Drama Theatre
places.perex: If you enjoy drama plays, then head straight to this overwhelming theater. The shows are stunning.

places.name: Sate Opera Bourgas
places.perex: Seated in a building with interesting architecture, you can watch amazing performances of well-known signers here!

places.name: Puppet Theater
places.perex: Puppet theatre has a long history in Bulgaria and performances of this one are very popular! 3 million people have already seen them.

places.name: Drama Theater Adriana Budevska
places.perex: Many famous directors and actors have worked here making it the most popular theatre of Bulgarian southwest.

places.name: Boyana Waterfall
places.perex: Located in the Vitosha Nature Park, this 15 metres tall waterfall is the highest in the area. You can get there by a pleasant walk.

places.name: Banya
places.perex: Banya is a town in Southern Bulgaria. It is in Karlovo Municipality, Plovdiv Province and is close to Karlovo.

places.name: Plovdiv Opera House
places.perex: Dress up smart and be elegant because this is the finest and most prestigous cultural scene of Plovdiv. Operas are in Bulgarian.

places.name: Wooden Windmill
places.perex: While entering the Old Nessebar by a narrow isthmus, you can see a windmill. It is of simple shapes and considered a symbol of the town.

places.name: Ivan Vazov National Library
places.perex: The Ivan Vazov National Library is a library situated in Bulgaria's second largest city, Plovdiv.

places.name: Battle of Varna Park
places.perex: This old park commemorates the 15th century battle against the Turks. Also serves as a museum - various war-related memorabilia on display.

places.name: Chaspik
places.perex: One of the many clubs to enjoy at the Kraybrezhna aleya Beach, 4aspik specialises in the local folk pop music.

places.name: Varna City Art Gallery
places.perex: The Boris Georgiev City Art GalleryBulgarian: Градска художествена галерия „Борис Георгиев“, Gradska hudozhestvena galeria „Boris Georgiev“…

places.name: Loven Park
places.perex: An extensive park with lots of verdure will carry you away! You can rest from the bustling of Sofia here.

places.name: National Maritime Museum
places.perex: Interesting museum dedicated to national naval history - with major emphasis on its military side. Small but insightful.

places.name: Ponedelnik Pazar
places.perex: Haggle hard to fill your bag with fresh fruit and veggies. The market is a particularly interesting strip of shops.

places.name: Grand Mall
places.perex: Prime spot for a shopping spree. Come for the summer or winter sellouts. Good bargain.

places.name: Petko Zadgorski Art Gallery
places.perex: A gallery in the city centre where various kinds of art are on display.

places.name: Arena Cinema
places.perex: Several cinemas form a network together all over Sofia. They project the latest movies as well as local production.

places.name: Command Post of Sultan Murad II
Thracian Mound and Tomb-IV c. BC

Park Muzej Car Osvoboditel Aleksandr II
Stoyan Bachvarov Dramatic Theatre
places.perex: The Stoyan Bachvarov Dramatic Theatre is a theatre in Varna, Bulgaria, founded in 1921 as the Municipal Professional Theatre.

places.name: Ruins of Eumolpias
places.perex: There is a treasure here! The ancient ruins of a Thracian town are to be found on Prayer Hill (Nebet Tepe).

places.name: St Sarkis
places.perex: Armenian Orthodox church rebuilt from ashes after a fire. Cross-shaped, with ornate interior and many interesting details.

places.name: Pedestrian Bridge
places.perex: Following the main street from the Central Square you reach the Maritsa river. It's a fine spot for taking a little rest.

places.name: Intercession of the Mother of God
places.perex: This church with rounded lines has a unique arched tower with a bell inside. It is dedicated to the Mother of God.

places.name: National Ethnographic Museum
places.perex: In this museum, you will see the whole Bulgarian culture in one building. Folk costumes, decorations, ceramics and lot more!

places.name: Knyaz Aleksandâr Street
places.perex: This street overflows with fashionable boutiques and trendy shops. Far from being mainstream.

places.name: Sâborna Street
places.perex: It gets going during the day here. Many antique shops are lined in this street.

places.name: St. Nikolai Church
places.perex: Centrally situated and yet rather off the beaten path. Definitely pop in to marvel at the wonderful frescoes.

places.name: Church of Sveta Bogoroditsa
places.perex: It's hard not to notice the pink and blue tower of this church! 19th century architecture with typical icons.

places.name: Tropcider Park
places.perex: Spectacular house with richly decorated interior full of fine furniture and superb paintings is a nice option to go for.

places.name: The Roman Aqueduct
places.perex: The remains of a then modern aquaduct and a great invention reminds us of the craftsmanship of ancient Romans.

places.name: Trabi Monument
places.perex: A 'memorial' to a popular small car called Trabant. If you want to take cool photos, go there and enjoy the vehicle!

places.name: Etnographic museum
places.perex: The inconspicuous Revival house hosts one of the most captivating exhibitions in Varna. Come here to see how people used to live!

places.name: Vinnyj zavod Black Sea Gold winery
Club for sport and adventures "Free element"
V5M Punkt za godisni pregledi i avtoserviz
Specialized Hospital for Active Treatment of Pulmonary Diseases - Gabrovo
Odraniski manastir Sv.Sv. Apostoli Petr i Pavel
Nacionalen centr po hematologia i transfuziologia
